articles.title: French pet care firm stops selling fish bowls - they drive fish mad - CNA
articles.description: Round fish bowls are already banned in Germany and several other European countries.
articles.content:
A leading French aquarium vendor has decided to stop selling round fish bowls because they drive fish mad and kill them quickly.

articles.title: European Countries Consider Living with COVID-19 - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Some European countries are considering changing their COVID-19 policies from crisis supervision to treating it as a normal infectious disease like the flu.
articles.content:
Some European countries are making new policies to deal with COVID-19 as a usual, infectious disease, similar to the flu, and not as a public health crisis.
